name: 卡森·利奥塔

last_movies.title: Sunfish (& Other Stories on Green Lake)

introduction: AboutActress and model known for being the daughter of famed movie star Ray Liotta. She's worked extensively as a model for Brandy Melville.Before FameShe was first approached by Brand Melville when she was 14, but had to wait until she was 15 to start working for them.TriviaShe made an appearance in the 2000 movie A Rumor of Angels, playing the infant version of James Neubauer. She has more than 30,000 followers on Instagram.Family LifeHer mother is Liotta's ex-wife Michelle Grace.Associated WithTrevor Morgan played the grownup James Neubauer in A Rumor of Angles.
